rights: adb actually will run a server, if you attempted to run adb without root privileges it would have started the server with the permissions of your current user. Run sudo ./adb --kill-server

you need to run ./adb because the platform-tools directory isn't in your $PATH variable
run this command without quotes "sudo ./adb kill-server && sudo ./adb start-server"
